item.title: 第二條 教旨 Article Two - Core Teachings
item.description:
Here is the translation of the provided text in a table format, with the original text and its English translation side by side:

This translation maintains the comprehensive and nuanced nature of the original text while conveying its religious and philosophical teachings.
Certainly! Here are alternative translations of the text, presented in a table format:

These translations offer different perspectives on the core principles and aims of the teachings, emphasizing various aspects of spiritual and moral development.
Certainly! Here are translations of the text "第二條 教旨" from a Confucian perspective, focusing on the ethical and social principles characteristic of Confucianism:

These translations focus on the Confucian aspects of ethical cultivation, social harmony, and the integration of personal virtues with societal responsibilities.
